QuestData.Title: Darkness Falls
QuestData.Description: It is already beginning, over the hills to the southeast.$B$BNer'zhul has everything he needs to summon the Dark Star. The Iron Horde attack on Karabor is imminent. This is where everything ends.$B$BChampion, I must ask you to ride ahead and delay Ner'zhul. I will join you as quickly as I can.
QuestData.CompletionText: Today is the day that everything ends. But something new rises from the ashes.
QuestData.RewardText: Prophet Velen is gone, and yet there is no time to mourn.$B$BWe will honor Velen's passing once the Iron Horde have fled from these hills.$B$BNow, champion, is the time to fight!
